name: Drawdown Book Reference Scenario
description: This scenario uses the inputs that were used for the Scenario developed for the Drawdown Book Edition 1. The scenario assumes a fixed percent of the TAM is adopted for Efficient trucks as the TAM grows.

name: Efficient Truck Share of Market is Fixed
description: Drawdown calculations for REF adoption of Efficient Trucks based on fixed percent of growth of trucking. The 2014 - 2018 values are taken from estimates of historical data
